attributes.action: Abolish all hunting with hounds, including "flushing out" by dogs to be shot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish all hunting with hounds, including "flushing out" by dogs to be shot."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11104.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/abolishhunting/
